top_categories.workout_context: Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience’s ontario rolling, local event demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience. Make this intensity feel like home.
Racing Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience’s ontario rolling gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
The varied gradients at Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience’s ontario rolling gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Every session at Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
Muscular force work builds the torque for headwinds and ontario rolling gravel at Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience — when you can’t spin, you grind.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience’s 55 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on ontario rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: ontario rolling, local event, canadian gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Over Under to prepare you for 55 miles of ontario rolling gravel in Calabogie, Ontario, Canada.
